Package com.tknkla.rj.groups

Interface LongGroupOperator

  • public interface LongGroupOperator
    Group operator interface for longs.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Timo Santasalo
    See Also:
    RJ.propagate(long[][], java.util.function.LongBinaryOperator, LongToIntBinaryOperator, LongGroupOperator, java.util.function.Predicate)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static LongGroupOperator ADDITIVE
      The default group operator (additive).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      long applyAsLong​(long a, long b)
      Applies the (commutative) group operation.
      long cancelAsLong​(long a, long b)
      Applies the (non-commutative) inverse group operation.
      long identityAsLong()
      Returns the identity element.
      int signum​(long v)
      Returns sign of an element; inversion of an element negates it's sign.
